title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Terrorist Cell and Hezbollah Infrastructure in Lebanon: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a terrorist cell and terror infrastructure in Lebanon.

Earlier today, IDF forces attacked a terrorist cell in an area that tried to launch an AT missile towards the territory of the State of Israel. In addition, IDF tanks attacked the terror infrastructure of Hezbollah in Lebanon.

Following warnings in the north of the country, launches were identified from Lebanon towards the Jiftakh and Margaliot areas in the north, which fell in open areas, no one was injured. The IDF fired at the sources of the fire.

Also, the IDF attacked several areas in Lebanon with artillery fire.

Attached is documentation of the attack: https://bit.ly/3Nt8ez8
